resources.string:
Aplication Colombia Turism
Villavicencio City
By Marlon Ortiz
Version 1.0
2015
The Libertadores park is considered one of the best one in the capital; there, the busts of Simon Bolivar and Francisco de Paula Santander are located.
The monument to Cristo Rey, was inaugurated in 1954, it is located in the high zone on Redentor hill, situated in Llano avenue. It is the perfect place to enjoy spectacular views to the city.\n\n

The Malocas shows the culture of llanos, taking part in the Colombian history, in an environment surrounded by exotic flora and varied samples of bovine, equine and other animals.
 Inside the thematic park, there are exhibitions about the worse life world, it is the perfect place to learn about them, its habitat, characteristics, the stables, the llano work, the cultivation area of manioc banana and tapocho.

There are appropriated places for agrotourism, thanks to its infrastructure, the ranches, the natural reserves and all referent to llano culture.
The visitor can rest in agro-tourist ranches that has rural environment where people can appreciate the daily work as cattle farming, agriculture, fish farming; also taste the typical food, enjoy listening the llanera music or practicing horseback riding.

The Ocarros Bio Park, a natural reserve, is a place dedicated to natural richness of the region. There, people will appreciate many animals and the diverse fauna. It has big green areas, paths, serpentarium and aquarium.\nIt is the first zoo in the country where live regional animals of the llano, has different ecosystems, varied fauna and typical flora of Colombian Orinoquia.\n

The Brizantha Hotel Campestre features an outdoor pool and a restaurant and is located in Villavicencio, just 15 minutes driving from the city center. It also has Wi-Fi and hot tub outdoors. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning , satellite tv, minibar and private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Most accommodation overlooking the pool or gardens. The Brizantha Hotel Campestre has shared terrace and meeting facilities, a communal lounge and games room.

Duranta Hotel is a boutique corporate hotel with modern construction, designed to create spaces that invite the rest, harmony and intimacy. Our staff is characterized by a common goal, to provide the best guest experience, through excellent attention and quality service. The spaces such as auditoriums, playground, meeting room, pool, steam room, gym, spa, restaurant and rooms are spacious, fresh and friendly to the environment around them, making them ideal for relaxing or for celebrate special events. Every day we strive to maintain high standards of quality care, food and maintenance of facilities, so we are committed to customer satisfaction. Hotel located near the Hacienda Marseille, steps ahead of the Fourth Division of the Army and facing the Apiay Air Base in via Puerto López.

Space, functionality, privacy and technology. All rooms have been designed taking into account the latest concepts of comfort, both for relaxing and for the moments work, wireless, voice over IP, programmable answering machine and work area.\nServices: Room service / Concierge / Business center / Laundry / Gym / Pool / Spa / Jacuzzi / Turkish / Sauna / Transportation Service / security service / Internet wifi / parking / Massage room / Terrace.\n

Based on a concept of the decade of the 80s, give life to a new alternative entertainment for the city, a diner with the best memories of that generation bar, that is why you are getting the best TV series from Mazinger Z, to Los Magníficos. You are always wellcome to enjoy the best drinks of the 80s.

Night entertainment, good atmosphere to share with friends and family. Good llanera music and dance shows.
Location: Front of Villacentro.

Baku Plaza Bar is definitely the place to enjoy good music site, the best drinks, cocktails and spirits, the city, the style "Outdoor Bar". Safe, cozy and spacious parking, is located in the sunroom of the adjacent corridor to the Villacentro Multiplex Cinemas Mall, a covered square, nestled in the vegetation of this beautiful garden. At all times it has a nice atmosphere even with summer sun in the shade of a lush Saman and refreshed with the evening breeze.\n

\nColombian city, capital of the department of Meta, is the most important commercial center of the Eastern Plains. It is located northwest of the department of Meta, on the left bank of the river Guatiquía.

GENTILIC: Villavicences.

POPULATION: 488,366 inhabitants

ECONOMY: Agriculture, mining, trade, tourism, agribusiness.

WEATHER: Tropical, warm and humid.

TEMPERATURES: 20 to 38 degrees Celsius.

AREA: 1338 km2
